description: To commemorate the legacy of their founder Michael Turner. Aspen is releasing a special Michael Turner Sketchbook: 'Aspen: The Early Years' softcover jam-packed with 48 pages of many never-before-seen Turner layouts, sketches, popular covers and much more from his early days of Aspen Comic's formation. The Turner sketchbook is limited to only 1,000 editions in a beautiful softcovers. Aspen strongly encourages fans to order early to pick up their copies as the sketchbooks are expected to sell out fast!
name: Aspen: Early Years

description:
Aspen is proud to be releasing the second special commemorative volume of Michael Turner's Sketchbook: 'Aspen: The Hero Years'.

A 48 page softcoverjam-packed with many never-before-seen Turner layouts, sketches, popular covers and much more from his Aspen titles such as Soulfire and Fathom, along with his memorable run at DC Comics. The Turner sketchbook is limited to only 1,000 copies and Aspen strongly encourages fans to order early as the sketchbooks are expected to sell out fast!
name: Aspen: The Heroic Years

person_credits.name: Jack T. Chick
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description: The red hot Michael Turner Sketchbook returns to Comic Con 2012 for its third and final installment! The 'Marvelous Years' features many new and popular Turner drawings from his last pencil work on Soulfire to his many incredible covers and illustrations done for Marvel Comics. Also including numerous never before seen sketches and pre-lim drawings, this highly limited sketchbook is not to be missed!
name: Aspen: Marvelous Years

description: The big news in the second volume of the complete Li'l Abner is Al Capp's creation of the first Sadie Hawkins Day, in which the womenfolk chase the menfolk, and whosoever gets caught is brought to the altar before Marryin' Sam himself. Presenting the daily strips and color Sundays from 1937 and 1938.
name: Volume Two: 1937-1938

volume.name: Al Capp's Li'l Abner Complete Daily & Color Sunday Comics

person_credits.name: Lynda Barry
person_credits.role: writer, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

volume.name: Lynda Barry Free Comic Book Day Activity Book Special

description: Collects issues 1-7 of Scout

Dr. Caspar Nordling is developing a micro-organism that is deadly to Aliens, but not to people. He's had a lot of luck engineering selective viruses to kill rats and weevils, but this is something altogether different. Highly speculative. Highly volatile. Just like the doctor himself. In a remote sector of the galaxy, on an isolated Grant-Corp space station, the thin line between science and horror is narrowing, and Philip and Joy Strunk, two company employees, are finding themselves on the short end of the cut.
name: Volume 8

description:
1. Bad Karma (starring the Moron)

2. Mr. Natural Wants to Talk to You!

3. Bad Karma Continues (starring The Moron)

4. The World and Its Ways (Mr. Natural, Flakey Foont : on back cover)
name: Bad Karma

description:
Nancy and Lucifer filleted their way out of Hell... and they left the Gates open. Now demons are pouring on Earth, angels want to destroy the whole planet before the Hell spreads through all the realms. And Nancy, her daisy dukes and her trusty chainsaw are in the way! Featuring Lucifer, the Twelve Disciples of Hell, giant demons and nekkid angels! If you like grindhouse films and crazy, gorey fun, be sure to check this volume written by El Torres with artwork by the insane master of detail Enrique Lorenzana!

Collects NANCY IN HELL (ON EARTH) #1-4.
name: TPB
A Tale of Midways and Molemen part II

description: Buried treasure from THE PERHAPANAUTS vaults! Includes THE PERHAPANAUTS 5.5, THE PERHAPANAUTS 6, THE PERHAPANAUTS HALLOWEEN SPOOKTACULAR 1, and THE PERHAPANAUTS: MOLLY'S STORY 1. Plus; never-before-published stories from the online "Tales from the Perhaps"! and other extras!
name: Volume 2

description: 'Archie Marries Veronica.' After the smashing success of their television debut, Betty and Reggie have a decision to make whether they want to continue down the reality TV path. As Archie and Veronica start up their new business ventures, things seem to be looking up for the happy couple for the first time in a long while. 'Archie Marries Betty.' Jughead makes the transition to fatherhood with a baby on the way, meaning he's also looking out for his kid sister's best interest whose boyfriend is sketchy at best. While Cheryl stays positive about her fight with breast cancer, someone close to the gang is about to have a brush with death.

"Archie Marries Betty." Jughead makes the transition to fatherhood with a baby on the way, meaning he's also looking out for his kid sister's best interest whose boyfriend is sketchy at best. While Cheryl stays positive about her fight with breast cancer, someone close to the gang is about to have a brush with death.

"Archie Marries Veronica." After the smashing success of their television debut, Betty and Reggie have a decision to make whether they want to continue down the reality TV path. As Archie and Veronica start up their new business ventures, things seem to be looking up for the happy couple for the first time in a long while.

Stan Kidderick, Ninja P.I. is not really a ninja at all. And in fact, he's not even a very good private investigator. He can't actually use the sword he carries around and he only wears a ninja mask, which he never takes off. He seems quite strange, but he's just a man who coped with having everything he loved in life taken away from him, by convincing himself he was meant to fight crime as a ninja detective. Yes he's lonely, and yes he's only hiding from the pain of his former life. But he's busy working whatever cases he can get using his true calling and talent in life, computers.

Chapter 2 of 4. Stan Kidderick, Ninja P.I. is not really a ninja at all. And in fact, he's not even a very good private investigator. He can't actually use the sword he carries around and he only wears a ninja mask, which he never takes off. He seems quite strange, but he's just a man who coped with having everything he loved in life taken away from him, by convincing himself he was meant to fight crime as a ninja detective. Yes he's lonely, and yes he's only hiding from the pain of his former life. But he's busy working whatever cases he can get using his true calling and talent in life, computers.

Chapter 3 of 4. Stan Kidderick, Ninja P.I. is not really a ninja at all. And in fact, he's not even a very good private investigator. He can't actually use the sword he carries around and he only wears a ninja mask, which he never takes off. He seems quite strange, but he's just a man who coped with having everything he loved in life taken away from him, by convincing himself he was meant to fight crime as a ninja detective. Yes he's lonely, and yes he's only hiding from the pain of his former life. But he's busy working whatever cases he can get using his true calling and talent in life, computers.

Never before tested in battle, without the services of his trusted mentor and bodyguard, Asta must stand against an invading army, the King of the Dragon Tamers, and one more unknown foe -- someone even the mighty King fears - before he can finally claim his heritage. Learn the final fate of all the members of the quest in this dramatic series conclusion.

Arriving March 2013 as a full-length original graphic novel from Archaia Entertainment, HAWKEN: GENESIS will establish and explore the exciting world of Illal, the planet on which the Hawken video game takes place. Developed alongside the game's Creative Director and lead conceptual designer, Khang Le (Project Offset, Flight) of Adhesive Games, HAWKEN: GENESIS will feature work from some of the top conceptual artists, comic illustrators, and painters in the industry, serving as both prequel and sourcebook to the epic warfare players will experience firsthand in the game. Readers of this OGN will be exposed to the vast mythology behind this visually stunning, post-apocalyptic world and the pivotal few individuals who determined its fate. The first exclusive comiXology preview, "Prelude to Ruin," is written by Jeremy Barlow (*Mass Effect*, *Star Wars*) and illustrated by Francisco Ruiz Velasco (concept artist on *Hellboy 2*, *Pacific Rim*, and *The Hobbit*).
name: Prelude To Ruin

description: Downloading this FREE release by 12 a.m. PT on January 1, 2013 will entitle you to receive a unique code that can be redeemed within the free-to-play (F2P) online video game HAWKEN, good for 2000 Hawken Credits of in-game currency that can be used to buy items, upgrades, and accessories. This unique code will be emailed to the address associated with your comiXology account." On the distant world of Illal, corporate rivalry turns to warfare as secret technologies are discovered, coveted, and stolen. Mega-planetary corporate empires, SENTIUM and PROSK, each seek to out-jockey each other in the race for technical superiority in the marketplace, but when the value of that superiority eclipses the cost of human life, no degree of diplomacy can bridge the gap. Now, with the discovery of a revolutionary new geological element, both sides fight tooth and nail for the materials that will keep them one step ahead of the other in an escalating arms race that will ? unbeknownst to all ? lead to the ruin of the planet? In this second of four preview releases, exclusive to comiXology, writer Jeremy Barlow (Mass Effect, Star Wars) and artist Bagus Hutomo (Shrapnel, Heavy Metal) bring you "CAT AND MOUSE", lettered by Deron Bennet (Tale of Sand, The Dark Crystal).
name: Cat And Mouse

description: Return to the world of MEMORIAL in "Imaginary Fiends," an all new digital-only 9 part series! The fantasies and fears that seem so real to children are often forgotten in adulthood. But after the events of the first Memorial miniseries, forgotten memories are being recovered all over the world. Can those lost fears and fantasies be far behind? Brought to you by Chris Roberson (EDISON REX, iZOMBIE), Rich Ellis (STARS BELOW, TWILIGHT ZONE), and Grace Allison (WANDER). Chapter 6 of 9.

A drugged-out Fairbanks licks the face of God, it's movie time with "E for vEndetta," Sawyer learns the truth about Cecania and Threat, Father Greensworthington is hauled off to jail, and Cecania and Harmony babysit some kids who are crazy (and we mean CRAZY) about a merchandising phenomenon known as UNICORNIMALS! SEXY BONUS: Each issue includes a peek into Cecania's Private Party, the fan-service-fueled SORE THUMBS subscription site!

One of the web's fastest-growing gaming comics is collected for the first time! Meet the staff of the Sore Thumbs Video Game Shop: Cecania, the busty ultra-liberal with a heart of gold and a brain of silly putty; Fairbanks, her ultra-conservative brother whose secret desire is to play video games in the nude with George W. Bush; Harmony, a ditzy brain surgeon who quit her high-pressure profession to hang out with her best friend Cecania and play games all day; Sawyer, The Iraq War veteran who lost everything in the war but his innocence; and Coleman, a tiny blue polar bear who may be the world's most valuable weapon.

Based on the classic science fiction television series Space: 1999 and set in the continuity of the original series! In this stunning conclusion, two astronauts are left stranded in a devastated space ship, with little hope of rescue. A conspiracy theorist attempts to flee the quaking Earth. A chairman defies God, daring him to destroy his high rise building. And survivors rally together to convince the government to find and save the people stranded--possibly dead--on Moonbase Alpha. Told from the point of view of those left behind on a ravaged Earth, Aftershock explores the scientific, environmental, and socio-political repercussions of a world left with no moon.
name: Aftershock & Awe, Part 5

description: ImageComics and Todd McFarlane Productions are excited to announce that THE ADVENTURES OF SPAWN is now available on comiXology! Two 48-page issues of THE ADVENTURES OF SPAWN, with bonus material that never appeared in print, are on sale now!
name: TPB

description: Archie's Holiday Hijinks!
name: GN

description: Bastard Samurai takes place in present day Manhattan and focuses on Jiro, a killer at the top of his class at the KoZu sword school. The underground training camp in midtown takes in orphans and twists them into Bushido warriors used by the Yakuza in death matches staged across the city rooftops where Japanese businessmen gamble heavily on the always-fatal outcome. Collects BASTARD SAMURAI #1-3.
name: TPB

description: There is a place deep down South where dreams come true and nightmares find flesh. A place where the oppressed discover freedom and the oppressor violent retribution. The swamp is alive with many a lost soul's tale. Bayou Arcana unlocks a universe steeped in Southern Gothic Romance and spattered with supernatural horror. Featuring 10 new stories by the hottest upcoming (male) writing and (female) art talent on offer. Enter the Arcana if you dare...
name: GN

description: For 25 years, the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund has fought for the free speech rights of the comics community, protecting creators, retailers, publishers, fans, and more. This annual comic explains the work we do, and what we accomplished in 2012, featuring awesome art by a wide array of supporter artists.

The biggest hit show of 2010 for Nickelodeon now hits the comic page! Four friends from Minnesota started a pop singing group on the show, and now you can learn the back-story of these four young men and their co-stars. Find out where Kendall, Logan, Carlos and James came from, and see what brought these four young men into the limelight for all the world to see. Be here as you join the phenomenon that is sweeping the nation.

Lovato began her career on the Disney Channel, starring alongside fellow pop sensations the Jonas Brothers, before rocketing to music stardom with two Billboard chart-topping albums. The inspiring young singer is set to host the second season of The X Factor this fall. Chronicling her early years, through her rising career, to the present, "Fame: Demi Lovato" is a must have for Lovato fans everywhere.

Bluewater Productions' latest offering in it's popular line of Fame biography comics features up and coming boy band One Direction. One Direction is a British-Irish boy band consisting of members Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Liam Payne, Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson. Chronicling their career, "Fame: One Direction" starts at the beginning, with the band's performance on the popular reality TV show X-Factor.

Selena Gomez is young, talented, and she's dating Justin Bieber! It's been a meteoric rise for her, from the girl-next-door to Queen of the popular music world, and Bluewater has the whole story! Selena Gomez: Young At Heart will set young fans hearts a twitter!
A fantasy manga following two women: Maytag, a nymphomaniac jester with split personalities; and Bernadette, a deadly-cool swordswoman. This is a comic about relationships and compromise.
name: GN

description: FREE FIRST ISSUE! A fantasy manga following two women: Maytag, a nymphomaniac jester with split personalities; and Bernadette, a deadly-cool swordswoman. This is a comic about relationships and compromise.

Accidentally releasing the souls of 117 executed killers from Hell would ruin anybody's day. But for prison undertaker Frank Timmons, that's just the beginning of his troubles. During their first murder spree, the undead killers have slain his beloved Dorothy, and the only way he can save her soul is to track them all down and send them back where they belong! Written by veteran storyteller and artist Shannon Eric Denton (The Revenant) and novelist/comic book writer Jeff Mariotte (Desperadoes), Graveslinger features dynamic art by John Cboins and Nima Sorat that captures the series' horror, humor, and sense of fun along with the widescreen feel of everybody's favorite Western epics.
name: GN

description: Shianndrea Toshigawa is "The Chosen One" of the Toshigawa Ninja Clan. She is the only warrior powerful enough to save the world from the wrath of the Knave, a demonic samurai army led by her father, Terminus. Although Shianndrea longs for a normal life away from the weight of her destiny, she is hunted at every turn. Taki Sato, one of the most deadly warriors in all of Japan wants Shianndrea dead and the monstrous tracker known as Desai would like nothing more than to restore his honor by breaking Shianndrea and returning her to Terminus. Now this reluctant warrior must cope with the fear of her destiny, a battle to the death and a rumor that another clan member is traitor. Created by Martheus Wade and optioned for a motion picture, "Beginnings" will be the first in a series of Jetta: Tales of the Toshigawa digital omnibus collections to be released over the next two years. "Beginnings" collects Jetta: Last Chances (first published in 2003) and Jetta: Crucible (first published in 2009) into one 120 page full color graphic novel. With all new story additions, art and ending commentary, Beginnings brings an entirely new reading experience to these exciting books and provides an excellent jumping on point for new readers who have always wanted to check out one of the most popular female characters in independent comics.
name: Book One

volume.name: Jetta: Tales of the Toshigawa - Beginnings

description: In the future, the gaming industry will be taken by storm by Mystic Revolution, the world's first completely interactive MMORPG. With the revolutionary "halo" system, players can now experience the pain, pleasure, and hangovers of their characters on a whole 'nother level! After serving a year long ban, all ex-moderator Lourdes wanted to do was relax and enjoy some solo play. Unfortunately, she finds herself stuck with a not-so-l33t ninja who won't take her subtle--and not so subtle--hints to go away. Together, they meet an odd assortment of other players on their quest for life, levels and lots of alcohol! This volume collects the first 9 chapters of the webcomic, as well as convention report comics, holiday strips, and an all-new bonus story exclusive to the graphic novel edition. Addionally, it features all new artwork for the first chapter and some of the splash pages! .
name: TPB

description: Los Angeles; some call it the city of angels, others call it a cesspool of debauchery and self indulgence, but whatever you choose to call it, one thing is clear; L.A. is where all the action is. When an entertainment newspaper stops covering celebrity tabloids and starts to focus on the superhero community, all Hell breaks loose. From closeted capes, to drugged out Do-Gooders, no one is safe from the poison pen of Sara Michaels and her award winning snake of a photographer, Glenn Barry. This book explores what goes on under the spandex, and we aren't talking Botox!
name: GN

description: Collecting the first six months of the critically acclaimed webcomic, Particle Fiction Volume 1 includes a touch of science fiction, fantasy, crime thriller and much more! "Particle Fiction by David Wynne is the latest monthly web series to have us impatiently drumming our fingers on the desk as we wait for the first of the month to roll around" - SFX Magazine Rather than being one single, ongoing storyline, Particle Fiction features a rotating main feature; one month may be a gritty crime story in a modern realistic setting, while the next might be a science fiction story set in the far reaches of space, the one after that a whimsical all-ages fantasy.
name: GN

description: The environment is faux Depression era Hollywood, complete with snarling gangsters in snappy suits, the untouchable wealthy , corruptible starlets in sleek revealing gowns, and elegantly designed automobiles set against the poverty and despair of the average joe. And in the middle of all this a world of celluloid dreams is being created. Private detective J. Parker Wrighte, is on an upwardly mobile career path from his lowly dust bowl beginnings, but finding that every advancement comes with cost and compromise. In this episode, when a new client doesn't show, Wrighte investigates the disappearance and gets more than he bargained for.

When the earth is in an ice age and many are searching for the legendary land,

One day, two births, same hospital... and that is where the similarities end!

One baby born to a middle class suburban couple, and the other to a

mysteriousand exotic lady called Victoria, visiting from a different planet.

Suddenly, when the babies are switched and given to the wrong parents, both

the Earth and the alien planet face a great peril. Malicious? Coincidence?

Planned? As both go through years of alienation, they ultimately learn that

they must overcome it to save the world.

Don't let the wild winter winds wilt your fervor for forays into the unknown! Our lovely steampunk lasses with their laces and brasses-ahem, lace and brass-will steam up your longest nights of the year!

Story Titles

  • Dr. Frankensteam's Monster's First Christmas Tree
  • Island Getaway
  • Kandy Kane: Steam Elf
  • Preview: Steampunk Snow White

volume.name: Victorian Secret: Girls of Steampunk Holiday Special

description:
Ciphers. Codes. Encryption. Passwords. Meet the best of the best elite Cryptanalysis Unit of the F.B.I. as they puzzle out the truth and protect all of us from those that would steal information in ways that can shatter the global community. But what happens to the Cryptanalysis Unit when one of their own goes missing? Is this a puzzle the puzzle-solvers can't solve? And will this cipher reveal things about themselves?

Back Blurb

Crack the code

Ciphers. Codes. Encryption. Passwords.

They are the elite Cryptanalysis Unit of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, responsible for protecting America from those who wish to do it harm. Led by Donald Foster, they are the best of the best at getting to the truth and protecting information that could shatter the world. But what happens when one of their own goes missing? Is it the one code these codebreakers can't crack?

In the thrilling genre of blockbusters like THE DA VINCI CODE and THE BOURNE SUPREMACY, comes an action-packed espionage comic that will leave you asking for more!
name: TPB

description:
• One Piece Ch. 692 (Kuzan appears on the magazine cover only)
  • Kuroko's Basketball Ch. 194
  • Toriko Ch. 215
  • Saiki Kusuo no Psi-nan Ch. 32
  • Naruto Ch. 613
  • Nisekoi Ch. 55
  • Assassination Classroom Ch. 24
  • Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma Ch. 4
  • Haiky!! Ch. 42
  • Bleach Ch. 520
  • Retsu!!! Date-senpai Ch. 15
  • Beelzebub Ch. 185
  • Hungry Joker Ch. 6
  • Sket Dance Ch. 262
  • Shinmai Fukei Kiruko-san Ch. 5
  • Cross Manage Ch. 14
  • Gintama Ch. 427
  • Kurogane Ch. 64
  • Kochikame Ch. 1773
  • Medaka Box Ch. 175
name: No. 3, 2013

description: The environment is faux Depression era Hollywood, complete with snarling gangsters in snappy suits, the untouchable wealthy , corruptible starlets in sleek revealing gowns, and elegantly designed automobiles set against the poverty and despair of the average joe. And in the middle of all this a world of celluloid dreams is being created. Private detective J. Parker Wrighte, is on an upwardly mobile career path from his lowly dust bowl beginnings, but finding that every advancement comes with cost and compromise. Working for the Kinchay Agency, Parker is investigating a case for Louis Orwell, one of the most powerful men in Retrowood; but at every turn he is continually dragged back into contact with his past, beginning with the murder of his best friend from childhood, Henry Irving. Drunken priests, sadistic nuns, nymphomaniacal wives, with basketball and gambling thrown in?. How can you go wrong with that?

Private Investigator J. Parker Wrighte continues his probe into the underbelly of Retrowood ,matching wits with Mucho Puente and Chloe Orwell , a pair of sociopaths looking to carve out their own criminal empire. Who killed his old friend Henry Irving and what does that have to do with the current case that Parker is working on for the wealthy and powerful Louis Orwell? The detective learns that no matter how hard we try to escape, our past is always with us. Saturday Matinee film noir escapism in the tradition of Hammett, Chandler, Bulldog Drummond, the Spirit, the Falcon and a host of others. Features sketchbook section.
Princess Lono's father has been killed and Princess Pira comes to rescue her before Pira's evil mother attacks with her army. Lono and Pira ride off on the back of a fire wolf named Yonder.
name: Part One

description: Lono, Pira, and Yonder face an earth monster that propels them into the air. Afterwards, they must climb the side of a mountain to reach the cave that leads to Spera.
name: Part Two

description: Lono, Pira, and Yonder take shelter from a thunderstorm in an old shrine. There they are surprised by a spooky, speechless boy, before venturing to the village of Lantern.
name: Part Three

description: Lono, Pira, and Yonder stay with an innkeeper named Sana who draws them a map of the path to the city of Kotequog. The eerie boy has appeared again, this time as a henchman for Pira's mother.
name: Part Four

description: Pira makes a secret visit to a cave to ask a floating head to grant her sword magical powers. The head agrees, but nothing is given freely and she must defeat a horrifying monster. This issue closes with two short stories.
name: Part Five

description: Part 6 features two short stories First, Lono, Pira, and Yonder fight off a horde of ghosts guarding an old house while Chobo steals the treasure hidden within it. Then, The group attacks a tribe of blood demons whose blood is made of gold.
name: Part Six

description:
Chan Lono's life as a princess consisted of sitting, reading, and dreaming-until the day Pira, princess of a neighboring kingdom, arrived with news of a waking nightmare! With the help of Pira's best friend-a fire spirit in the form of a dog named Yonder-the princesses now find themselves in a race against evil. The goal: Spera, a magical realm of which the princesses had only ever heard the tallest tales. The prize: their very lives!

Digital chapters are also available for this volume as Spera Volume One.
name: Volume 1

description: Exiled princesses Pira and Lono travel to the bustling city of Kotequog to avoid the clutches of Pira's mother, the Evil Queen. Obtaining jobs as adventurers, the two best friends set out on a series of quests that land them in perhaps more excitement than they'd bargained for. Told in four chapters and a series of stand-alone shorts, each drawn by a different rising talent in comics, Spera: Volume 2 brings the same gorgeous artistry as its debut installment.
name: Part One

description: Part 2. Exiled princesses Pira and Lono travel to the bustling city of Kotequog to avoid the clutches of Pira's mother, the Evil Queen. Obtaining jobs as adventurers, the two best friends set out on a series of quests that land them in perhaps more excitement than they'd bargained for. Told in four chapters and a series of stand-alone shorts, each drawn by a different rising talent in comics, Spera: Volume 2 brings the same gorgeous artistry as its debut installment.
name: Part Two

description: Exiled princesses Pira and Lono travel to the bustling city of Kotequog to avoid the clutches of Pira's mother, the Evil Queen. Obtaining jobs as adventurers, the two best friends set out on a series of quests that land them in perhaps more excitement than they'd bargained for. Told in four chapters and a series of stand-alone shorts, each drawn by a different rising talent in comics, Spera: Volume 2 brings the same gorgeous artistry as its debut installment.
name: Part Three

description: Part 4. Exiled princesses Pira and Lono travel to the bustling city of Kotequog to avoid the clutches of Pira's mother, the Evil Queen. Obtaining jobs as adventurers, the two best friends set out on a series of quests that land them in perhaps more excitement than they'd bargained for. Told in four chapters and a series of stand-alone shorts, each drawn by a different rising talent in comics, Spera: Volume 2 brings the same gorgeous artistry as its debut installment.
name: Part Four

description: Exiled princesses Pira and Lono travel to the bustling city of Kotequog to avoid the clutches of Pira's mother, the Evil Queen. Obtaining jobs as adventurers, the two best friends set out on a series of quests that land them in perhaps more excitement than they'd bargained for. Told in four chapters and a series of stand-alone shorts, each drawn by a different rising talent in comics, Spera: Volume 2 brings the same gorgeous artistry as its debut installment.
name: Part Five

description: Exiled princesses Pira and Lono travel to the bustling city of Kotequog to avoid the clutches of Pira's mother, the Evil Queen. Obtaining jobs as adventurers, the two best friends set out on a series of quests that land them in perhaps more excitement than they'd bargained for. Told in four chapters and a series of stand-alone shorts, each drawn by a different rising talent in comics, Spera: Volume 2 brings the same gorgeous artistry as its debut installment.
name: Part Six

description:
You've been wondering it for months now... what will happen to Abby's bookstore? Wait, no. You've been asking, "Is it a boy? A girl? Twins? Triplets? Will it have powers? Is it an illusion cast by a magic spell?" (Okay, we'll answer the last one right now: No.) Your questions will be answered this issue! And, seriously, the fate of the bookstore is revealed, too.

  • Digital release date: December 12, 2012
  • Print release date: January 9, 2013

volume.name: Love and Capes: What To Expect

description:
The first time in print for these digital-first adventures!

Batman must save Vicki Vale from The Mad Hatter!

Follows up The Mad Hatter battle from BATMAN: ARKHAM CITY!

Features Catwoman, Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy
name: Vicki in Wonderland

description:
The first time in print for these digital-first adventures!

Part 3 of the first Ame-Comi story line!

The origin of the Duela Dent!

First appearance of Ame-Comi Brainiac!
name: Duela Dent

description: Still on the trail of a serial killer targeting Gotham's citizens, Batman finds the common thread among in the victims. Each person has a unique skill, or knowledge the killer needs to move forward with his obsession. But will Bruce Wayne's attempt to get his name on the list lead to disaster? "Off the Menu" part 2 of 3.
name: Off the Menu, Part 2 of 3

description:
The entire original John Ostrander/Timothy Truman GrimJack run, from its very beginnings in Starslayer to the first 21 issues of First Comics' solo title. BlacJacMac! Bob The Watchlizard! Goddess! Gordon Munden! They're all here in all their amazing glory! The creation that made comics superstars of Ostrander and Truman, now all gathered in one stellar Omnibus edition!

Collecting the Grimjack stories from Starslayer issues #10-17 and Grimjack issues #1-13, originally published by First Comics between 1983 and 1985
name: Volume 1

description:
The out-of-this-world adventures of John Gaunt continue in the second Grimjack Omnibus. John Ostrander and Timothy Truman's celebrated tales continues with issues #14-30, including 'Decaying Orbit,' the three-part 'Trade Wars,' ''Screaming Steel,' and more!

Collects Grimjack issues #14-30.
name: Volume 2
